DOC.detailed_description: The investigator propose multi center randomize , parallel-controlled trial evaluate efficacy safety balance chiropractic therapy CSR . Participants age 18 65 , conformity diagnostic criterion CSR pain score regard visual analog scale 4 point less 8 point , include randomly allocate two group : test group control group . Participants test group treat balance chiropractic therapy , control group receive traction therapy . The primary outcome pain severity ( measure visual analogue scale ( VAS ) ) . Secondary outcome include cervical curvature ( measure Borden index ) , composite functional status ( measure Neck Disability Index , NDI ) , individual patient health status ( evaluate SF-36 health survey ) , adverse event report trial .
